posts.post_content:
PSA-graded Ramlys

The following Ramly-backs are reduced to $150 each for PSA 2's, and $175 each for PSA 2.5's, check or money order.  The blank-back Moran is $200

Please contact me via EMAIL: [url]lessdrama@gmail.com[/url]

left-click thumbnail to super-size

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST204-MoranBB.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/Page-T204-Ramly~~element420.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST204-Lush.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/Page-T204-Ramly~~element419.png[/IMG][/URL]

Hi-res scans of the remaining cards (ignore prices on website): [url]http://t206themonster.com/Page-T204-Ramly.html[/url]

I'm a motivated seller - won't go below my cost, but will come close :)

These are great cards, and tough to find (low population for the entire set), but the market says they ain't so interesting at the moment, so grab them while that's still the case.

Prices reduced to:

PSA 2's - $140 shipped
PSA 2.5's - $165 shipped
Blank-back Moran - $190

check or money order. 

Please contact me via EMAIL: [url]lessdrama@gmail.com[/url]
